text: "Am I Ever Gonna See Your Face Again" is a 1976 debut single by Australian rock band The Angels and is the leading single from their debut studio album The Angels. It went to number 58 on its initial chart place and went to number 11 in 1988 after it was issued as live single from their live album Live Line. == Track listing == ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Pub rock songs Category:The Angels (Australian band) songs
title: Am I Ever Gonna See Your Face Again
